data.eml:eml: A phylogeny for Aromobates (Anura: Dendrobatidae) with description of three new species from the Andes of Venezuela, taxonomic comments on Aromobates saltuensis, A. inflexus, and notes on the conservation status of the genus

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Barrio-Amorós, César Luis, Santos, Juan Carlos (2012): A phylogeny for Aromobates (Anura: Dendrobatidae) with description of three new species from the Andes of Venezuela, taxonomic comments on Aromobates saltuensis, A. inflexus, and notes on the conservation status of the genus. Zootaxa 3422: 1-31, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.210130
